settings.heading: How can I add store credit to my account?
settings.desc: Store credit can only be added to your account if you have intiated a return for your Cash on Delivery order or any promotional activity from EDIT.

settings.heading: Return Policy
settings.desc:
(A) Returns
1. Item(s) purchased may be returned within 14 days from date of transaction, under the below conditions. Contact our customer service team to arrange a free pick up on 800EDIT (8003348) or email us at info@byedit.com
Exchanges are not applicable.
• Item(s) must not have been worn, used, altered, or damaged and must be returned in its/their original condition along with boxes and warranty cards.
• Earrings are non-refundable and, therefore, not applicable for returns.
(B) Refunds
A refund will be done in the same payment method once it has been approved, excluding the delivery charges. If the payment was done using Tabby, your refund will be processed in accordance with Tabby's terms and conditions.
(C) Care/Use Instructions
The customer must comply with all the care/use instructions outlined in the manual where provided.
(D) Additional Terms and Conditions
Additional terms and conditions associated with any promotions run by any boutique shall be incorporated into this policy by reference. By proceeding to purchase, the customer acknowledges and accepts these as terms of the applicable promotion(s).
Customers may contact us on 800EDIT (8003348) or email us at info@byedit.com for further information about the Return Policies.
